body:
Each page in the tour is accompanied by an explanatory text to its right, which you're encouraged to read. In this case, it says

> Run the code. Then rename math.pi to math.Pi and try it again. 

The error in the initial code is intended. I'd suggest that instead of filing more issues (#12761 and #12762), you read the actual text. That should surely take less effort than filing all these issues.
